name: Building-blocks
tagline: This is a game I made in python. It's not quite completed, but fun at the moment.
body:
Building Blocks is a small, two dimensional environment that mimics Terraria. While it is empty, and in need of features, we currently have:
- Map Generation (With hills, biomes and trees)
- A 'Survival Mode'
- A few different kinds of blocks
- A crafting menu
- And much more!

Building Blocks is coded in python and pygame, which means even an amateur programmer or bored teenager can easily fiddle around with the code.

As a game, Building Blocks is not complete, however, our [Github Page](https://github.com/C1ffisme/Building-Blocks) is open for people to submit pull requests and issues. Please help us there!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
